item.title: Rob Pike's simple C regex matcher in Go
item.description: Translating Rob Pike's simple and elegant C regex matcher to Go.

item.title: Tools I use to build my website
item.description: How I build my website benhoyt.com with GitHub Pages, Jekyll, a simple HTML+CSS layout, Sublime Text, and Sublime Merge.

item.description: Why and how I added proper CSV support to GoAWK, my POSIX-compatible AWK interpreter.
